title: Complete Project Proposal
description: Write and finalize the project proposal document for the upcoming client meeting.

title: Prepare Presentation Slides
description: Create presentation slides for the team meeting to discuss project progress and updates.

title: Review Code Changes
description: Review and provide feedback on the latest code changes submitted by team members.

title: Submit Monthly Report
description: Compile and submit the monthly progress report summarizing achievements and challenges.

title: Organize Team Building Event
description: Plan and coordinate a team-building event to strengthen team bonds and morale.
